tool.name: OTB.SampleExtraction
tool.description: Extracts samples values from an image.
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayin False isArrayvec False output_data_out $output_data_out name OTB.SampleExtraction in $in vec $vec outfield $outfield outfield.prefix.name '$outfield.prefix.name' outfield.list.names '$outfield.list.names' field '$field' layer $layer ram $ram prefer $prefer response $response outputType_out $OutputSection_out.outputType_out transmissionMode_out $OutputSection_out.transmissionMode_out

param.name: in
param.label: Support image
param.help: Support image The following data types are allowed in the txt file: png, tiff, jpeg

param.name: vec
param.label: Vector data file containing samplingpositions. (OGR format)
param.help: Vector data file containing samplingpositions. (OGR format) The following data types are allowed in the txt file: png, tiff, jpeg

param.name: outfield
param.label: Choice between naming method for output fields
param.help: Choice between naming method for output fields

param.name: outfield.prefix.name
param.label: Prefix used to form the field names thatwill contain the extracted values.
param.help: Prefix used to form the field names thatwill contain the extracted values.

param.name: outfield.list.names
param.label: Full list of output field names.
param.help: Full list of output field names.

param.name: field
param.label: Name of the field carrying the class name in the input vectors.
param.help: Name of the field carrying the class name in the input vectors.

param.name: layer
param.label: Layer index to read in the input vector file.
param.help: Layer index to read in the input vector file.

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_out
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_out
param.label: Output vector data file storing samplevalues (OGR format). If not given, the input vector data file is updated
param.help: Output vector data file storing samplevalues (OGR format). If not given, the input vector data file is updated

tool.help: The application extracts samples values from animage using positions contained in a vector data file.
